text: So, how is the wine search going?
My name is *name*. I'm here to take part in the contest
Well, obviously you can't join. You're not qualified.
What can I do to enter?
Well.... Bring me my favourite wine - Chateau Margaux 1982 - I might reconsider...
But how am I supposed to get it!?
A bribe? You gotta be kidding
Remember, lavender won't freshen up without fruits!
Well well, you actually found my wine! Stunning! Give it to me. Now there are just a few thing we have to wrap up.
There are some minor preparations left here on set. And you, as a participant, shall also need truffles.
Since you're so eager to take part in the contest, you need to talk to Monique about these mushrooms. And help me, naturally.
What do I need to do?
You can first find some tasty juicy fruits for our guests
What do you want? Read the sign, we're closed.
Truffles she needs! Bonbonï¾‘s health is my only concern right now. He is terribly, terribly sick. Get out!
Oh, you really want to help? That is so sweet of you! What did you say your name was?
*name*, thank you! Could you go and get my little Bonbon a blanket? I'd go myself, but I can't leave him, I just can't!
Oh, you have it! Now you'll be warm, sweet Bonbon! But he is still sick! I don't know what to do! I'm going to faint, ah!
How? Oh, what if he's dying? What am I gonna do without him! I'll die too!
He looks better already, don't panic!
Maybe... Yes! We should get him some medicine. That will help, I hope. I can only hope now!
Don't worry, I'll get the medicine
Hello *name*! I hear you have some hardship entering the contest. I can help you.
How do you know my name?
Let's just say, I'm a friend of your granny. But more importantly I hold a certain sway over Julien.
What would you want for it?
Quid pro quo. You give me things, I give you favors. There are some items you can help me acquire.
Choice is all yours, *name*. But the first thing I'll need is a basket
Oh, I see you took up my offer, *name*. Well, thank you.
I just hope it's not a trick
This will really help me. So... let's see what's next on my list...
We should switch to something more complex or we might get bored. We don't want that, do we, *name*? Bring me a nice sharp saw.
Well-well, the fruits' are... fine. I guess you can handle simple tasks
But there's more to do, I hope you understand. You understand, right?
I'll pretend I believe you. The second thing we need is a nice tablecloth set for our guest tables.
This tablecloth actually looks good. You have some taste, shocker!
You think very little of me, huh?
But! The fruit you've got is not enough!
Well, I guess I didn't bring much
Exactly! Go get more fruits. And get some wine to serve too, and please don't screw this up!
Oh, he seems to be feeling better! Thank you so much! What would I have done without you. You saved my baby!
But I think now that he's recovering, we should help him get better
He needs more nutrients! We need to cook up my special piggy food for him. Would you bring some ingredients?
Bonbon loved the food so much! You're a treasure, where have been all my life!
I think when you came, you mentioned truffles. Did Julien send you? If we want any truffles, we first have to replace my basket
I can't find it anywhere. And, naturally, I can't go without it..
Hmmm, this saw is acceptable. It should do for my needs...
Certainly. Nothing of value comes easily, *name*
Nothing too taxing, however. I need a few meters of wires and a nice handy knife
Excellent! You see, we make up quite a team
But I still don't know what we are doing
I'm just in it for your help
Fair enough. Could you bring me some food? Fruit, perhaps?
Bet it's for you evil plan as well
I'm offended, *name*. Do you think I don't eat? An apple a day and all that.
Fruits and wine in place? Good job! Give me a high five!
What else do we need. Lemme check. Right! A fine set of plates for our participants, you included, to serve up their masterpieces.
Well, these plates are actually fancy. I am starting to think there is something in you.
Now to the cherry on our cake of a competition. We need flower garlands to crown our winners at the end. Something beautiful!
Where do you get these ideas??
I saw something like that when I was hosting in London. They were simply beautiful! And elegant! We totally need it! Go-go!
Oh this basket is even better than the one I had! But if we want any truffles, Bonbon should be dressed for the forest.
A new costume is what he needs. Yes-yes, cute and comfortable! Can you bring me one, *name*?
Weird is becoming the new normal...
This costume is so so cute! And it matches my hiking outfit! Perfect, just perfect!
Can we talk about truffles now?
Ohoh, truffles! We are coming! Wait! We'll have to eat out there in the forest, right? Could you prepare a picnic basket for us?
Oh, what a pretty basket you've brought! And you totally got everything we need in it. Now we can go truffle-hunting with my baby Bonbon!
These were actually fairly tasty, thank you.
Now off to something more entertaining! I really need a decent camera. With tripod. Not a challenge for you, right, *name*?
You are making these up to taunt me?
Hm, you have some technical expertise, *name*. It'd be quite something to know you in private life...
Why do you need those things?
That really none of your business, *name*. My next request is very much your business, however.
I need some very specific pills. I wrote the name for you. Please don't mess it up, *name*.
Well-well... That was the last item on my list. You did quite well, *name*. Better, than I expected
I gave you my word, did I not? I shall speak to Julien and... Persuade him...
Oh man, these garlands are awesome! Simple and beautiful! I like your idea to use lavender, adds a local vibe and excellent smell!
I did my best given the circumstances
But a litte, almost tiny, problem arose....
The microphone I planned on using at the competition is dead. I need a new one. Be quick, we have to test it before the event!
You should be more careful with your stuff
Oh good, the new mic. That's much better. I hope the quality's good, or there'll be consequences
Can we get back to the competition now?
While you were gone I realized you've only brought the plates. And what about silver cutlery?
But you've only asked for plates!
I brought what you asked for
Nonsense! When I say tableware I mean everything one needs to set the table! Forks and knives included.
If you don't understand such simple things there is no place for you at my competition!
Okay, I'll bring cutlery as well
No need to be rude, I'm going
See, it's easy if you want it. As I predicted, you amateurs are too slow for gourmet cuisine. But I'll give you one last chance.
I want the mayor to sit on special chair. After all, HE dragged me to this dump. We shall pay tribute.
What do I have to do with it?
What do you mean? Go get me the chair. And saw it thoroughly!
Perfect. We're gonna rock this town, baby! Seems you're not that dumb. Forgive my honesty. You're not easily offended, right? We're cool?
Great, great! Then go, prepare for the contest, it's gonna be big!
So, you have your moment of glory ahead of you, *name*? Let me give you a piece of advice.
Not so fast, *name*. Quid pro quo, remember?
One last thing. I could really use a shovel.
Yes, of course, I'll get it
Thank you, *name*. And my advice is simple: believe no one. Your path will be more tangled than you can possibly imagine.
Now it's time for you to fly to Paris, little *name*, fly, fly, fly...
Hello. So you're the new intern?
Good. Be ready to work hard and do what people tell you to. Only one of our many interns will get the letter of recommendation.
You seem eager, that's a good start. Wait... My mustache is crooked, isn't it?
I knew it! And I don't have my mustache comb on me. Bring me one, that'll be your first task.
Mademoiselle, come here. I don't recall seeing you here before and I know everyone in my restaurant
Oh, I recall Gabriel telling me some interns were coming. Are you the one who won that competition in Provence?
Naturally! You seem to be free, so I have a task for you. Get me a new chef's cap, mine's rather dirty.
You, come here. Quickly! You're one of these useless interns Gabriel hires all the time? I can tell by your vacant stare...
Do you have nothing to do? Why are you wandering around the restaurant? Outrageous! If you're free, go get my ring!
Yes! My ring! I don't know where it is, so go find it. Why are you still here? Go!
Thank you for helping with my little mustache problem. I'm sorry for making you spend time on my personal requests.
Right, right... I was supposed to give you some papers to sign, but I can't find any in this mess!
Yes. But it would be very helpful if you brought me a box to store all these papers.
I'll see what I can do
Order is restored! Now we can get back to work. Let me see what we need to do today...
Right. You see, our head waiter is on sick leave. She's pregnant, apparently. Oh, I wish people took family planning more seriously!
Anyway... She's supposed to buy fresh flowers for the tables every morning, but since she isn't here, you'll be doing that
I see, I'll be right back
I like the cap you've picked, thank you. I see I can count on you
Since you're proving to be so helpful, I'd like to ask you for help once more. Is that okay? You aren't busy or anything?
Well, I can squeeze it into my schedule
Wonderful! Then please get me some new headphones. Just basic ones. Mine are broken, and what's a dinner without a little music!
Tr?s bien! Now I can enjoy my music while cooking. You'll make a great cook, mademoiselle. Thank you
Well, there is more I'd like you to do. Maria, our head waitress, she is pregnant, you know, from one of my guys they say, ho-ho
So love is in the air here?
Ho-ho, I've got carried away. She brings me fresh bones every morning, for the strays, you see, and I don't want to leave them hungry...
Is one of them called Tramp?
Hm, you found the ring, you say? Do you expect a pat on the head? Don't. You're here to work.
There's more you have to do for me. Go get a new pan. With nonstick coating, a ceramic one. Got it? Now go!
I did my best, that's all
This pan will have to do. There is room for improvement, *name*. I'm starting to wonder how you managed to win that competition.
I did my best, that's all
If you say so, but I'm still skeptical. Enough talking, go get me some shoe wax and a brush. In black, if you please.
Do I have to explain it again? Just go an do what you are told.
Thank you for your help. But there is no time to rest, I've just received exciting news, but this means more work for us
The prime minister himself is going to dine in our humble establishment with his foreign colleagues tonight.
We need everything to be absolutely perfect. Better than perfect even! I am counting on you to make it happen.
Good, good. Then the first thing is preparing a set of napkins embroidered with our symbol.
That's what I call a challenge!
You've got the napkins? Good job! You're one step closer to your recommendation letter. And to learning the big secret too!
I wish all the interns were as good. Nonetheless, ther's still a lot of work waiting to be done!
What else do you need me to do?
We need to clean everything up. A broom and a feather duster should do. Let's not miss a single speck of dust!
You are incredibly efficient, *name*. Don't forget to include this in your CV if you're ever writing one!
But I have to take you off the preparations and ask another personal favor. My phone isn't responding, right when I need it the most!
I cannot look for a replacement now, I'm too busy, so I place my trust in you, my best intern of the year.
I'll find you the best phone out there!
This phone is excellent. Thank you. Reliability is the virture of kings as they say...
Now I can call my friend in the mayor's office and ask them to turn on lights of the the Eiffel tower a few hours earlier for our guests!
Now back to the preparations! We have to think about how everything, you and me included, looks when we greet our esteemed guests
That means we have to look flawless tonight! And I don't have a tailcoat. Please get me one, if you're not too busy with other errands.
I'll bring it as soon as I can
I'll go see the tailor then
Now that I have the tailcoat, it's time to take care of the finer details. The devil is in the details, they say
There's a devil in your kitchen too
What I need to fully refine my look are shiny shoes and athoroughly combed mustache, n'est-ce pas?
That will surely drive them wild
With great mustache comes great responsibility! Bring me shoe polish, a shoe brush and, of course, a mustache care kit!
I'd recommend a razor but ok...
Now that my mustache is done, I'm ready to greet our guests. Everything should be perfect! And it will! Won't it?
You are doing such a good job here. I can see why your grandmother recommended you for initiation.
Well, there is a certain group and we want you to be a part of it, but I cannot tell you more just yet. Now get back to your duties.
Did you hear the big news? It's not the first summit meeting in this restaurant, but I'm still thrilled. You must be too.
You've only just arrived and there's already an opportunity for you to see the prime ministers. And even help with the preparations!
Yes, there's a lot of work
I am really glad to take part!
If so, please help me a bit. Something terrible happened with all our pots and pans. The coating has come off! Get new ones, will you?
Now all the pots and pans are in order, we can get to work! Ho-ho, this is gonna be a culinary cabaret, if you know what I mean!
I'm not sure I want to know
As for you, could you do me a tiny favor, mon petit pois?
It's my daughter's birthday tomorrow, you see, and I still don't have a present for her. Could you make her a nice gift card?
Anything to help a great parent
What a pretty gift card! This will make my dear Violette smile. Thank you!
Maybe we can arrange something more? A nice little trinket in lots of colorful wrapping paper? I love wrapping paper!
Could you get Violette a gift? You're a girl too, you should know what she'd like! I have no idea what you girls find cool
But I don't even know her!
I see you paid attention to my remarks about colorful wrapping paper, ha-ha. What's inside...? No, don't tell me, I like surprises!
But you look disappointed. What is it? Oh, I know, you are eager for kitchen duties and I send you on all these boring errands
Yes, I wish I was washing dishes
I understand. I was like this when I was young, eager to work! Luckily, I have a job for you: I need heady Indian spices for the main dish!
For the main dish? I'll be right back!
Will I ever see the kitchen?
You talk to spices? So cute!
Mmm! What a smell! Come here, give it a try! Now, my fragrant friends, we will make you into something delicious!
Do you put your nose in all the food?
While you were out I had an excellent idea! We should decorate the hall. So everything's in perfect taste: the food and the interior
Are you sure it's a good idea?
Today we're doing a fusion table, so let's add some oriental details into our western interiors. I'm thinking origami.
Nothing says multicultural like folded paper
Wonderful origami cranes, mademoiselle! You have great taste and folding skills. Now we can decorate the hall. Just don't tell Gabriel.
He probably won't appreciate this, he is all about order, you know, boring! But now back to work, dinner is waiting!
I do have things to do!
Hey, intern! Why are you wandering around again? Do you have nothing to do?
I do have things to do!
If you have time to wander around, you have time to fulfill my requests too. There is no excuse for idleness here!
What can I do for you?
I stained my apron. And my cap is too old for the event ahead. As I'm too busy to get distracted by such things, you go get them for me.
I am glad I could help
You got my outfit? It's nice to see someone here actually does what they're told! I was starting to think that was the stuff of fairy-tales.
I am glad I could help
Since you are so good at running errands, they should have hired you as help, not a culinary intern.
I was just starting to think you were nice
So, help, actual cooks need ingredients, go find spices and some pork bones for the dish I'm preparing. Go already, you're distracting me.
Why are you so rude to me?
You call these proper pork bones? Goodness! And they want you in the Society. The standards are lower than ever!
Why are you so rude to me?
Why do you think you deserve proper treatment? You are no one and you did nothing to deserve my respect.
That's still no reason to treat me like trash!
There is nothing to discuss here. If you want me to treat you differently - earn it. Start by getting me a crate of champagne.
I understand, I'll go get it
This champagne is vaguely drinkable. I'll have to use it for lack of an alternative. As I said, your skill in running errands is something...
You should consider a career change. You can start simple by bringing me an outfit for the event tonight.
I have most of it, but I still need a bow-tie and an appropriate ring. Also shoe wax and a brush will come handy.
Now I am ready. We all have to make the best impression we can, so think about your outfit. Those rags won't do.
The dessert I'm preparing is not as ready as I am, though. It seems you have an opportunity to assist in actual cooking
Indeed. First go get some small pretty flowers, purple-ish. And then we're going to decorate the dessert.
These flowers are fresh enough I guess. Come and assist me. I need a pair of extra hands and everyone else is busy.
Now that everything is beautiful and ready I shall have some rest and you go get into a proper outfit!
Oh, no-no-no-no! This is all wrong! How could this happen!
My main course! My masterpiece! It's ruined. All the spices are wrong. And that broth, that is no tender beef, that's ghastly pork!
The spices were right! And the broth was right! It feels like some evil spell. And we don't have time to make a new dish!
Still we have to make something else. And quickly. Go, bring me some pans and pots, and more spices. And also some coffee, it helps me work
I'll be back with it in no time
Good, good. Thank you. Now let me work.
And please come up with some way to keep the guests entertained while I'm working. The preparations will take at least an hour.
I'll dance them a merry jig
This is a disaster! Everything is ruined! Our reputation is ruined. I knew something was going to go wrong, I felt it.
You're right, we have to pull ourselves together and fix things. I hate quick fixes, but desperate times call for desperate measures.
What do you have in mind?
Yes. There is a great bakery not far from here. Go there and get some croissants for our guests. And also get a nice porcelain stand to serve them.
This looks promising. That bakery's pastry is incredible, I hope our guests enjoy it until the main course is ready.
I'm sure they won't notice anything
Thank you for your help with this madness. Now that everything is more or less in order, I have time to thank you for all you help.
What an unfortunate turn of events with the main dish, don't you think? I am glad my part was all done perfectly
I will never screw up like Enzo did. But I don't have time to think about this now, I have my own plans for the evening
My plans are private, but you must still help me prepare. I need three simple things: a tailcoat, a bouquet and a card. Go get them!
You brought everything I asked for? Good. Since you helped me on so many occasions, I'll approve giving you the recommendation
Why does it feel like you're doing me a favor?
